analysis: The project is a static website with a desert/Egyptian theme. The CSS file needs to be updated with an Egyptian-themed color palette and UI elements. The HTML file requires a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon. The JavaScript file needs to be updated with improved mobile menu toggle functionality.

improvements.description: Update the CSS file with an Egyptian-themed color palette including warm desert tones, sand colors, and accents inspired by ancient Egyptian art.
Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.
Update the JavaScript file with improved mobile menu toggle functionality, including proper event handling, smooth transitions, and user-friendly interactions.
